extendedInfo.description: How to loss weight fast. 101 Effective ways to lose your weight, that should help you achieve your weight loss goals. Some are very simple how to diet tips, others are a little more challenging, but worth the effort. Simple rules for fast fat loss that works. The main point in dieting is to consume less food than your body needs. When this happens, your metabolism reverts to using stored energy in body fats. It uses those fats as substitute fuel, and your stored fats would be trimmed down using this method to a more desirable level.According to the CDC, two-thirds of  adults and children in America have been classified as obese. If you are overweight or obese, then you should know that there are several easy ways to lose weight.For thousands of years obesity was rarely seen. It was not until the 20th century that it became common, so much so that in 1997 the World Health Organization (WHO) formally recognized obesity as a global epidemic. As of 2005 the WHO estimates that at least 400 million adults (9.8%) are obese, with higher rates among women than men. As of 2008, The World Health Organization claimed that 1.5 billion individuals over the age of 20 are considered obese. The rate of obesity also increases with age at least up to 50 or 60 years old. Once, overweight and obesity, considered a problem only of high-income countries, obesity rates are rising worldwide. These increases have been felt most dramatically in urban settings. The only remaining region of the world where obesity is not common is sub-Saharan Africa. (Epidemiology of obesity, From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia).This application answers the questions: how to diet, weightloss, weight reduction, weight management, healthy diet, lose fat, losing weight, the best diet, weight loss fast, burn fat, quick weight loss, burning fat, quick ways to lose weight, best ways to lose weight. How to slim fast, diets, diet plan,  help lose weight program, be slim, weight and loss, how to lose weight in short period, dieting, help losing weight, slim diet,Â­ weight tips, how can you lose weight, about obesity,  diet for men and women.

reviews.title: Very nice and, help us...
reviews.comment: It is very nice app. But please remove the ads. Thankyou for helping us to maintain and to loose weight. But please remove ads.
reviews.author: Ali Charania

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Poorly written. Full of errors.repetitive.

reviews.title: there is a thing called too much water can kill you
reviews.comment: i rather work out then kill myself

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: Why many instruction is always water? That\'s not good to drink much water. But you can die if it too much
reviews.author: Boyet Galindo

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: I don\'t like this apps information at all. It\'s telling me too become a vegan, it\'s way too hard to do that. Most people live on meat. But anyway I just want to step my abs up a bit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Somethin I dont kno
reviews.comment: Well out of 101 tips I already knew 75 or more of them the otger 26 or less were good tips try them
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Silly
reviews.comment: I find the English poor, spellings, grammar etc.  It mostly says fill up with water so you don\'t eat as much, not a healthy idea. I don\'t think the \'tips\' have any medical basis. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but good.
reviews.comment: Good reminders about getting exercise and food intake.  Reasonable and free.  Everyone can do these and even though most are things we should all.know, the reminders ate good and there is a rationale with each tip.  Delivers what it is supposed to and I have no problems with this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s alright
reviews.comment: It\'s a bit difficult to trust the information.   There are too many grammar errors and spelling errors.  On top of that this app discourages snacking which I\'ve always heard it\'s good to snack in-between meals for portion control and your metabolism.   Great idea for an app though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idiot
reviews.comment: Only some of these tips will actually help you. Drinking alot of water can actually kill you not make you skinny, too much water will take away your sodium and your body needs sodium to function properly. My advice dont waste your data usage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idk :/
reviews.comment: Its okay nothing special. Theres alot of spelling errors and a lot of tjings I can\'t do because of my age and where i live. Don\'t get this app its not worth it.
reviews.author: Allison Conlon

reviews.title: Lame and full of typos.
reviews.comment: Waste of time. Honestly, if you want to offer an app, get someone literate to proofread before you go live. Chock full of badly-written and simplistic advice. FAIL.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 101 tips about diet
reviews.comment: they are very useful and work fast
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Get motivated
reviews.comment: Great advice and informations.
reviews.author: Nica Dee

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Contradicts itself, has bad advice and contains a lot of info that is just completely false. Im glad someone attempted to make sonething like this, but its horribly done. Next time give consistant advice and make sure your info is accurate. A lot of the stuff here just seems completely made up. This app could be salvaged by the removal,of the false statements and conflicting advice.
reviews.author: Erik Draven

reviews.comment: These  are the most simple ,effective and basic  rules not to lose only but also to stay fit and healthy.All of us must apply it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: This app really works but one problem is that it is basically saying the same things over and over but in different words but besides that it is AWESOME

reviews.comment: Way too many typos and only repeats things off weight loss programs, ads, shows and commercials. Nothing different from what i heard since i was 7.

reviews.comment: This is a really good app, it has good advise. The bit wer it says on water that is excelent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mostly useless
reviews.comment: I found a few of the tips to be helpful, but most are not and some are downright stupid.  #101 says the way to lose weight around your middle is to, in short, gain abdominal control which it pretty much says you can\'t do after pregnancy.  WTF?! Let\'s see, getting you abs to hold in will improve your appearance, but it will not reduce weight at all anywhere.  And yes you can, after pregnancy, regain abdominal control and hold in your gut.
reviews.author: Jessica Geurin
